To find an appropriate Hunting Location, you need to use the map
Open your map (ALT+M) and choose the Hunting Zone tab
Sort it by clicking the 'Level' column header two times
Now you can easily find a hunting ground best suited for your level
Most Hunting Grounds have teleports to them, from the nearest town

If you are struggling to find a teleport to the town nearest to your chosen Hunting Zone
simply follow the chain of town portals Gludin-Gludio-Dion-Giran-Oren-Aden-Goddart-Rune

Good luck!
